method.text: Cut the top off each onion. Scoop out the centre using a teaspoon. Finely chop the scooped-out onion. Fry chopped onion with the oil in a frying pan until soft and golden brown. Add the mushrooms and stir for 5 min.
Meanwhile, bring a large pan of water to the boil. Add the onion cups and simmer for 10 min, or until they begin to soften. Drain well.
Add the bulgar wheat, parsley, seasoning and water to the mushrooms. Boil for 5 min. Cover the pan and simmer for a 30 min, or until the grains have softened. Add extra water if needed.
Stir the sultanas into the bulgar mixture and spoon into the onions cups.
Put the stuffed onions in a roasting tin. Cover with foil. Cook in the oven for 30 min.
Remove foil. Sprinkle on the Parmesan cheese. Cook for a further 10 min. Serve.
